reason.raw: Models still need some tweaks. The PR can be revisited once we migrate to GitHub.
reason.html: Models still need some tweaks. The PR can be revisited once we migrate to GitHub.

description.raw:
Hello :)

I updated models of TurtleBot3. This update excludes unused plugin for gazebo standalone source code.

TurtleBot3 House is new map for multiple TurtleBot3. I draw this using building editor.

![turtlebot3_house.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/XXjgdKx/images/1235798448-turtlebot3_house.png)

![turtlebot3_house1.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/XXjgdKx/images/3379847338-turtlebot3_house1.png)

We developed new application for Gazebo. 
First, Control TurtleBot3 by standalone gazebo plugin
Second, SLAM by multiple TurtleBot3 in TurtleBot3 House.

The code is uploaded [Github](https://github.com/ROBOTIS-GIT/turtlebot3_simulations)
and [wiki](http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/platform/turtlebot3/simulation/#simulation) will be updated

Thanks
Darby
